The plot is filled with unpredictable twists and turns that make it quite engaging.

If you're up for some laughs and time travel, "Hot Tub Time Machine" could also be a fun choice. It stars John Cusack, Rob Corddry, and Crispin Glover, and follows a group of friends who accidentally get sent back to 1986 in a malfunctioning hot tub.
